sentences.sContent: After more than two hours in the chocolate, does he still have a taste for it?"Not so much anymore, " Garcia said.
sentences.sCn: 在身陷巧克力两个多小时之后，加西亚还有胃口吃巧克力么？ 他说：“再不要像这样多了！”

sentences.sContent: Garcia and Youngdahl live in a house for students with an interest in Russian studies.
sentences.sCn: 住在一起的加西亚和扬达尔都对关于俄罗斯的研究抱有兴趣。
